# CMake project autogenerated by GENie
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)

project(fitLTC)

include(GNUInstallDirs)
set(
source_list
  ../LTC.h
  ../brdf.h
  ../brdf_beckmann.h
  ../brdf_disneyDiffuse.h
  ../brdf_ggx.h
  ../dds.cpp
  ../dds.h
  ../export.h
  ../fitLTC.cpp
  ../float_to_half.h
  ../nelder_mead.h
  ../plot.h
  ../results/ltc.h
)

add_executable(fit ${source_list})
target_include_directories(fit PRIVATE ../../external/glm)
target_include_directories(fit PRIVATE ../../external)
target_include_directories(fit PRIVATE ../../external/CImg)
target_compile_definitions(fit PRIVATE cimg_display=0)
